name: Attention! Car Coming Free
description:
An exciting party is going to start. So, what should we do? Drive a car to pick up some friends and enjoy the happy time together. However, this is not an easy task. We need someone really good at driving. Will you come and help?

Highlights:
•it is free!!!
•Challenging gameplay
•Easy to learn but hard to master
•Great cartoon graphics and sounds
•Leaderboard to keep you challenged
•Game Center support
•OpenFeint support
